snippet: With Al Gore in attendance, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg gave his first major address on what New York City should do in a post-hurricane world.
abstract: New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, with former Vice Pres Al Gore in attendance,  pledges to aggressively pursue rebuilding city's damaged waterfront in wake of Hurricane Sandy, but warns no city can ever be protected fully; speech is Bloomberg's first major address on what city should do to prepare for future storms.

byline.original: By DAVID W. CHEN and MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM

lead_paragraph: With Al Gore in attendance, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg gave his first major address on what New York City should do in a post-hurricane world.

headline.seo: Bloomberg Pledges to Fortify New York’s Waterfront
headline.main: Mayor Pledges to Rebuild and Fortify Coast
headline.print_headline: Mayor Pledges to Rebuild and Fortify Coast
